bow: presents for year old am at loss in what to get my spawn for her birthday does anyone have any good suggestions what do did your babies love edit thanks for all the ideas christmas is coming up soon as well so this is super helpful should add that as far as family goes we are steering them towards gifts that provide experiences like romp and roll to try and limit the influx of stuff moving forward little people melissa and doug and duplo lego seem to be where my husband and are agreeing when it comes to the main toy groups we would like to stick to considered the tech playsets but think little people leave things open for more imagination and less batteries we also push the idea of books we both love to read and we both love to read to her we got ours kitchen helper http www guidecraft com kitchen helper used off craigslist she uses it every day still almost years later perfect for helping cook playing with toys at the counter and generally being up at adult level mine were big fans of the boxes their presents came in little people toy kitchen food amp dishes play do books any toy that makes horridly annoying music wtf how have not heard of this before my little girl just turned one on the 14th of this month we bought toy cell phone that is touch screen she also got sleepy time baby that has bear that lights up then the usual clothes if she likes toys that light up and make noise would start there brilliant mom recently posted that she got all of her year olds box of tissues and let them pull out every last tissue that baby crack know just looked for one on craigslist they re freaking amazing highly recommend mine is coated in wonderful varnish of play doh cupcake batter and bananas should wash it that is great idea mine would automatically eat the tissue though am saving this for when she finally stops putting all paper in her mouth definately plan on getting one at some point oooo oooooo my favorite present for one or two year old is the tomy eggs it is such great toy and one of those toys that is interesting at all different ages do get the other brands on amazon get the tomy as the quality is slightly better http tomy com lil chirpers sorting eggs these are cute foam blocks wooden blocks sound great until you realize that they will chew on them =splinters in mouth and they will be thrown at everything chipped furniture dented wood floors amp bruises we did get her thing she got so many presents from family we were going to wait until after her party to see what she needed she did need anything we went to build bear and let him pick out his own stuffy he does have many so we figu red it would be fun and he could keep it long time it was great experience he loved it yes my daughter was given these for her first birthday it now over year later and she still loves them easily the best toy present she was given we are pointing them towards getting together for romp and roll gift certificate or other experience type things am sahm and having more things to do with her would be great also books we got our ds play kitchen not the cheap plastic kind but wooden one from kidcraft he still uses it all the time three years later and it does show any signs of wear ball pit plastic pool and about 000 balls 500 per bag from toys us and she was the happiest girl ever we just went out for the day playground for the first time the mall where we got her sweater and out to dinner where we got her dinner off the kids menu it was way cute her favorite toys right now are her rocking horse those toys where you put shapes in holes board books toy keyboards and my old baby doll and old pill bottles that put beads in for her to shake like another poster got kidkraft kitchen my daughter loves it we also got her book case and she loves pulling all her books down books baby doll little people this was the start of the big collection she has now still her favorite activity large duplo blocks sit to stand activity thing cake yeah the cake was from us everything else was from other people our daughter got leapfrog toy computer on her first birthday like this one http www ebay com itm leap frog musical my own leaptop pink laptop computer for girls 371166024559 she played with that thing nearly every day and we only had to replace the battery once she is now five years old and we only recently got rid of it she still play with it but we decided to donate it since she can use one of our tablets for her games it was great because we could personalize it so that when she turned it on it would greet her with her own name did get my kiddo anything for his 1st since we had piles from the family however we have bilibos http www bilibo com en enter default aspx in my house and every little one that comes in loves them we have two littles that come over regularly both are yo and they love them my yo also loves them and has been using them consistently since we got them as gifts years ago they are my absolute go to present bought duplo for my daughters first birthday and at around 16 months she started getting really interested in it mostly just pulling it apart at 19 months she is now getting better at sticking bricks together but like the idea of presents that allow for imaginative play blocks tea set play food etc we got her toy kitchen and set it up in our kitchen it was the little tykes cupcake kitchen super cute we also got her little people play set if you want something memorable lasting consider really nice nursery light like this http www amazon co uk magic lantern revolving night trousselier dp b002zxzbqi ref=sr s=baby amp ie=utf8 amp qid=1413718560 amp sr=1 amp keywords=trousselier bear in mind your kid is going to be *deluged* in stuff from fond relatives they also wo have clue it their birthday for other kids birthdays always suggest disposable consumable presents such as crayons and paper or good book if you know the kid does have it already make it parent friendly ie something without too much text so it does take forever to read it meg amp mog books are great as are most books by julia donaldson got those personalised books for my kid first birthday and for her second birthday and she hates them finds them really boring and never wants to read them we bought some cardboard boxes at home depot and cut and taped them into play structure we figured that most kids just play with the boxes instead of the gifts so we made gift of boxes oh that looks great about to get my kitchen redone and was thinking of getting her some kind of barstool as want to teach her to cook that would be ideal haha we actually got our son big set of foam blocks for his birthday and now month later constantly finding tons of bite marks all over them we bought our son set of big foam blocks and one of those pop up tents with tunnel he was very nervous about the tent at first and would go in it unless we were with him and he would get scared if he was to close to the tunnel but now month later he loves it when he back in his room playing hear him crawling through the tunnel all the time oh and we bought bag of ball pit balls and put them in the tent tunnel other than that we got him clothes and some big boy sippy cups besides his birthday gifts he loves his shape sorter and toy car my son was born two weeks before christmas so while we did get him anything for his first birthday we got him few things for that christmas we got big boy forward facing seat the recommendation is now to keep them rear facing years or as long as possible is she walking we got one of those bubble poppers http farm3 staticflickr com 2077 3530792633 4daf3b7794 jpg for him and he loved it for quite some time if she is walking you could get walker type toy that has more support he likes dragons we found this spyro plush http thumbs2 ebaystatic com l225 mwdqs1kgh6ty7u9yb031ixq jpg that roared it horns were hard plastic and lit up and were good for chewing on it might be too scary for some little ones but the best part for us was the button to activate it was very easy to push at time when he could physically activate most push toys he played with it solidly for year after that and still carries it around when it gets an out of the toybox rotation while we did get him anything for his first birthday his god parents got him cute little tricycle even though he liked being pushed on it he could reach the pedals for another year and still ca pedal it on his own at almost be sure not to get something too advanced for her or you might not get any use out of it for while got my son those for easter he loves them got my kiddo potty did expect her to use it but she started sitting on it and was afraid of it when potty training came along she also got huge kick out of crawling in and out of the box it came in deleted did actually get my daughter anything for her first birthday my logic was we were broke and knew grandparents were going to shower her with gifts so it seemed kinda pointless and it just seemed silly anyway to go out and buy something withhold it from her for few weeks wrap it up and then unwrap it myself few hours later because she had no interest in unwrapping presents remember she did enjoy getting plastic boat to play with in the bath though for my girl one year birthday her favorite present was some nesting blocks she was just starting to explore the way things fit together so she loved it and still plays with it every day we wrote our daughter letter and started her savings account maybe you re ftm but we have so many toys it embarrassing we donate every year ask my in laws not to buy toys etc we still have birthday gifts from last december when she turned saving few toys for when her new sister is born kitchen is great idea but she did play with hers until about 90 of the toys we have were such waste but you ll ruin the patina penny got so many things from everyone one her favorites has been little xylophone and little drum daddy is drummer and she likes making noise and hearing the noises ot makes she might be musician who knows deleted my mom will be giving us money mil opened bank account and we asked aunts and uncles for experience play type things like romp and roll so we are going to be inundated with stuff and we can direct the toys she does get edit should add we tried out best to steer people towrds toys that would grow with her when she was born like the exersaucer that turns into standing play station in an effort to try and not have too many toys actually thinkwe did ok so far and even so feel like we have too many toys love buying toys for kids so understand why people do it for her do you have any pictures this sounds like great idea our son got this stuffed dog named scout for his 1st birthday he is incredible you program it with the computer around your child favorites food colors songs etc there is bedtime mode on it where it plays the songs you want it to and tells him goodnight every night our son gets so excited every time the dog says his name it great gift every 1st birthday party we go to that what we get the kid bought mega bloks http www amazon com gp product b0088lnf0k ref=oh aui detailpage o00 s00 ie=utf8 amp psc=1 for my nephew first birthday they re like giant legos researched what developmental milestones year olds go through and what toys help them with that development and toys that help them build was one of the suggestions according to his mom he loved the gift he loved the bag it came in loved to give her and her husband blocks one at time and pull the pieces apart he is quite able to put them together yet but will be soon imagine got the 160 piece set so there enough to share for playdates and the toy is recommended for ages we are far from relatives so we are getting money or certificates for experience things like romp and roll for our little gathering with friends we asked for no presents or books if they feel they need to get something my daughter just had her 1st birthday party yesterday her favorites included chunky puzzle peek blocks rock ride horse and of course the cake haha got sit to stand walker bead maze rocking horse leap frog reader and bunch of books but it was all gotten at consignment sale so since was saving money may have gone little overboard he also got some more toys from family we got him this http www amazon com gp aw b005j58cv0 cache=98d428816f135aaa96ff793bc1f5a6a9 amp pi=sy200 ql40 amp qid=1413736522 amp sr=8 ref=mp do you know the brand name deleted we did get bubble she was month old duplo and lego are one brand we are going try and steer people towards think little people and melissa and doug are the other two saw those and had wondered about them little people this is definately something we will be doing in the future wooden kitchen is on the radar for sure we go back and forth on the ball pit idea space is not terrible in our house but bit limited so much fun the gift have given my oldest every year for her birthday is her party and then one small thing book outfit special treat of her choice she selected mickey mouse for her first birthday party theme in the way infants select things she always gets so many gifts from our friends and family that it much more special to me and her too to plan party at local park experiment with baking fun cake we ve done mine craft cake large round layer cakes and even tiered cakes this year she turned 11 and it was the first year we did do that instead we let someone else do all the work and we went to medieval times even the lo loved it for first birthday kids are not going to notice if you get them present or not they get pretty overwhelmed by the whole present thing in fact experimented with having my daughter sit down with guests as they arrived also as they left and opening her gifts with them one on one little ones want to play with new thing little so this can drag on the present business forever this way kids get to play and givers get to see their gift get some love leapfrog have small plastic soda bottles with rice beans and popping corn in them beads are great idea colorful and noisy there are cute cheaper necklaces over at shana logic want to start collecting oh she loves pulling books out too toy kitchen is definately on the radar for future present love little people and played with them forever as child now that am not on my phone was able to see the night light it is really awesome we have the pop up tunnels at my parents from when my sister kids were little they are all in great conditionand forgot to grab them the last time we were up there oh know for sure she will rip the paper off she loves ripping paper we are going crazy especially since christmas is so close just few toys to level her up from the ones she has deleted drum is actually something we go today she had other instruments she has been playing with since she was months but loved the drum recently at my sisters house it has even more instruments with it too we are definately going to go the duplo lego route we already have lego table from craigslist in her room still put together lego sets we are making sweet potato cupcakes with yummy frosting ca wait as it will be her first sweetcakey thing had serioulsy considered that almost got one for her when she first started sitting to doubled as walking toy she still loves it love things that grow with the kids cuts down on toys bit edit it also served as cat toy with all the spinning parts thanks thanks ll check it out am using the first birthday as an excuse to get her some more age appropriate toys that she can play with over the next few years like little people stuff she has few that grows with her but those are getting to point where they are as interesting or useful now family is far so we are having small thing with our firends let them know toys were necessary though well then play food and play kitchen went over so well with my kiddo as are ride on toys we ve got push bike for our kiddo that we plan to stick her in from the time she can walk well enough zulilly always has good selection of wooden ones but lot of bike makers are starting to put out push bikes it might be fun to do trip to the toy store together and see what is interesting sometimes our boring grownup idea of fun does line up with the kiddo idea of fun ooo memberships are also great gift we ve used the crap outta ours so much so that next year when everything expires we ll renew it the gift that keeps on giving in my experience what one year old wants to play with most is you here are few things my year old friend really likes do you have perfect blanket for the two of you to hide under then peak out at dad one that is both small and light enough for wobbly toddler to wear as ghost and see through in some way such as something crocheted with holes or light enough to see through but colored so everything looks different color one is great age for those mind numbingly repetitive books like brown bear brown bear what do you hear and chicka chicka boom boom they are in fact just as entertaining the fifth time through stuffed animals loves them plays with them daily on the other hand my last toddler buddy was toy car man do know if you can find this particular one but our little tikes rocking cow http www amazon com little 5733159 il 570xn 272772185 jpg mickey has head shirt pants shoes hand does mickey head go on top or his shoes which piece is mickey hand this is understandable to toddler in way that the next puzzle look like they could fit anywhere this could work with some transparent colored scarves then you look through the scarves so the world looks blue yellow green etc after that no longer entertains you have some doll or animal blankets ineffective parachutes for toys bandages for dr toddler superhero capes bandannas not very blinding blindfolds hobo packs or whatever else kids little imaginations come up with we play lots but she is independent and loves playing for long stretches by herself as well she sits and preforms little experiments with different toys and get caught up in her own little games it is cute to watch amazon says they re listed ages to ve got 13 month old will this be safe absolutely they are just one solid piece of plastic no moving parts or small bits like said we regularly have friends with little ones over and they love them you can buy smaller ones cup sized or so or the bigger ones they can sit in we have the big ones and never had issues with them thanks for the tip got one big one and pack of the bowl sized she not engaging with it lot yet but it already doing duty as quick place to throw bunch of small stuffed animals shd and she loves shuffling crayons in and out of the little ones love simple toys like this any other recommendations would be great oh glad you like it like these types of toys too so much more creativity engaged
